issue.title: Splitwise Clone - Expense Sharing App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a web app where friends can track shared expenses and settle debts. Think Splitwise but simpler.

## Core Features

### Authentication
- Email/password signup and login
- Protected routes - must be logged in to use the app

### Groups
- Create groups for different occasions (roommates, trips, dinners)
- Invite friends to groups by email
- See all your groups on a dashboard

### Expenses  
- Add expenses to a group (who paid, how much, what for)
- Split expenses equally among group members
- View expense history in a group

### Balances
- See who owes whom in each group
- Simplified debts (minimize number of transactions needed)
- Mark debts as settled

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 with App Router, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Next.js API routes
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Auth**: JWT tokens with jose, passwords hashed with bcryptjs

## Pages
- Landing page
- Login / Signup
- Dashboard (list of groups)
- Group detail (expenses, balances, members)
- Add expense form
- Create group form

## Quality
- Clean, modern UI
- Mobile responsive
- TypeScript throughout
- Proper error handling

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router, configure TypeScript (tsconfig.json), set up package.json with all dependencies (next, react, better-sqlite3, jose, bcryptjs, tailwindcss), create .gitignore, and configure Tailwind CSS

workers.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project structure and TypeScript configuration. Create package.json with all dependencies (next, react, react-dom, better-sqlite3, jose, bcryptjs, tailwindcss, postcss, autoprefixer, typescript, @types/node, @types/react, @types/react-dom, @types/bcryptjs, @types/better-sqlite3), create tsconfig.json with strict mode and path aliases, and create .gitignore for Next.js project

Configure Tailwind CSS and create base Next.js 14 App Router structure. Create tailwind.config.js, postcss.config.js, and the app directory structure with layout.tsx (root layout with HTML structure and font optimization), page.tsx (landing page component), globals.css (Tailwind directives and base styles), and create the basic app directory structure including app/auth/login/page.tsx and app/auth/signup/page.tsx placeholder files

Create Next.js configuration and utility files. Create next.config.js with app router configuration, create lib directory with db.ts (database connection utility using better-sqlite3), lib/auth.ts (JWT utilities using jose and password hashing with bcryptjs), lib/utils.ts (general utility functions like cn helper for Tailwind class merging), and create .env.example file showing required environment variables (DATABASE_URL, JWT_SECRET)

ems.task: Implement authentication system (signup/login API routes in app/api/auth/, JWT utilities with jose, password hashing with bcryptjs) and database layer (SQLite schema with better-sqlite3 in lib/db/, user and group models)

workers.task: Create database layer with SQLite schema initialization, user and group models in lib/db/
Create authentication API routes (signup, login, me) in app/api/auth/
Create TypeScript types and interfaces for authentication, users, groups, and expenses

ems.task: Build group management features (create group API, invite members, group listing) and expense tracking (add expense API, expense history, equal splitting logic, debt calculation/simplification algorithm)

workers.task: Create group management APIs: implement database schema for groups/members in src/db/groups.ts, create group API routes in src/app/api/groups/route.ts and src/app/api/groups/[id]/route.ts, and implement invite member functionality in src/app/api/groups/[id]/invite/route.ts

Build expense tracking system: create expense database operations in src/db/expenses.ts, implement add expense API in src/app/api/expenses/route.ts, create expense history API in src/app/api/groups/[id]/expenses/route.ts, and build equal splitting logic in src/lib/split-expense.ts

Implement debt calculation and settlement: create debt simplification algorithm in src/lib/simplify-debts.ts, build balance calculation in src/lib/calculate-balances.ts, create balances API in src/app/api/groups/[id]/balances/route.ts, and implement mark settled API in src/app/api/groups/[id]/settle/route.ts

ems.task: Create all UI components and pages (landing page in app/page.tsx, login/signup in app/auth/, dashboard in app/dashboard/, group detail in app/group/[id]/, add expense and create group forms) with Tailwind CSS styling and mobile responsiveness

workers.task: Create landing page with hero section, features display, and call-to-action buttons, fully styled with Tailwind CSS and mobile responsive
Create authentication pages (login and signup) with form validation, error handling, Tailwind CSS styling, and mobile responsiveness
Create dashboard page showing all groups with add group functionality, group cards grid layout, and mobile responsive design

analysisSummary: Implement a Splitwise-style expense sharing app with Next.js 14, featuring JWT authentication, group management, expense tracking with equal splitting, and simplified debt calculation using SQLite and better-sqlite3.
